entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Blowing snow in the morning. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023
